product_name: Estee LauderSet + Refresh Perfecting Makeup Mist
summary: SummaryHighlightsSustainable PackagingInstantly hydrate, revive and soothe skin, wherever you go with Estée Lauder Set + Refresh Perfecting Makeup Mist. This invigorating face spray with electrolytes and caffeine immediately boosts skin's radiance.
details: DetailsBenefitsMist skin before applying makeup to help it set and reapply throughout the day to refreshHelps set makeup, refresh throughout your dayItem 2515496How To UseClose your eyes and mist on face. Apply as needed throughout the day.IngredientsWater\Aqua\Eau, Butylene Glycol, Polysorbate 80, Caffeine, Fragrance (Parfum), Calcium Chloride, Sodium Sulfate, Magnesium Chloride, Sodium Benzoate, Potassium Nitrate, Potassium Phosphate, Phenoxyethanol.Please be aware that ingredient lists may change or vary from time to time. Please refer to the ingredient list on the product package you receive for the most up to date list of ingredients.Shipping & Coupon RestrictionsThis brand is excluded from most Ulta Beauty coupons.See brand eligibility details
how_to_use: Close your eyes and mist on face. Apply as needed throughout the day.
ingredients: Phenoxyethanol.Please be aware that ingredient lists may change or vary from time to time. Please refer to the ingredient list on the product package you receive for the most up to date list of ingredients

reviews.headline: I just love it
reviews.comments: I love it!!!!

reviews.headline: LADIES!!! Do not sleep on this!!
reviews.comments: Look, I don't typically leave reviews for products, even when I love them... but this spray is on another level. This setting spray must be a part of your routine! I have tried every setting spray on the market, but Estée came through for us, ladies! If you pair this with Estee Lauder's Double Wear foundation, your final look will be immaculate for 15+ hours. Spray your entire face before and after make up application for the glowiest, softest makeup application.

reviews.headline: Game changer, worth the price and hype, all of it!
reviews.comments: This product does all that it claims for me. I never thought I would spend so much on setting spray but I won't be without it! I am 50 with the beginning of wrinkles and normal to dry skin. This absolutely melts my makeup in place and perfects it.

reviews.headline: Found a Dewy, Beautiful Primer for my 50+ Skin!
reviews.comments: This waa recommended by an Ulta makeup consultant while trying foundations. I actually already had a setting spray that I've used for years, but followed her suggestion as something new. So glad I did! Estee Lauder is certainly one of the cosmetic/skin care OG's, and this spray is awesome! Because I'm in my 50's, not all makeup products work well with my mature skin (Combination skin-more dry, with some sensitivity). This setting spray gives me such a natural, dewy glow, and really enhances my makeup application. I even notice a plumping effect when I wear it. I've had it for 6 months now, and have even tried others to compare my results-still the most hydrating setting spray in my cabinet. It is worth the splurge-I will repurchase.

reviews.headline: Try it!
reviews.comments: I switched to this from the Mac setting spray (I thought it made me too oily). Let me tell you, I am never going back. This smooths out my makeup and it looks flawless. I've gotten SO many compliments on my skin and how my makeup looks since using this. It looks smooth and natural. HOLY GRAIL PRODUCT.

reviews.headline: Not worth it
reviews.comments: I was excited to try this and it let me down compeltely. My skin didnt look better, feel better, and my make up definately didnt last. Returned.

reviews.headline: Pricey
reviews.comments: Really nice but i think too expensive for what it is. I returned

reviews.headline: Lasts all day
reviews.comments: No joke. I've slept in my makeup, woke up in the morning and used a make-up wipe and the amount i have to remove, incredible. I honestly could probably spray my face a few times with this and go another day with the same makeup. I do wish it was cheaper though.

reviews.headline: Love this Setting Spray!
reviews.comments: The best mist for a setting spray! No alcohol! Love the electrolytes and caffeine to boost and hydrate my skin!

reviews.headline: Love it
reviews.comments: Love it!!!

reviews.headline: WANT YOUR MAKE UP TO STAY ON ALL DAY? USE ME THEN
reviews.comments: I have severely dry skin so I can't use powder make up or setting powder. So this stuff works amazing! it doesn't soak my face to the point where my skins dripping wet, but it does make my foundation and contour stick on my face all day.

reviews.headline: Excellent setting spray
reviews.comments:
In the past I have used urban decay, benefit, and Milani setting sprays, but they would leave my face feeling tight and dry and I felt at the end of the day it took so much more soap and scrubbing to get off my make up off. I also tried supergoop and Milk, but those left me feeling oily and slick. This is a happy medium that provides make up with a boost to keep it looking fresh throughout the day but doesn't give a dry/tight/cakey feeling or appearance. 
I will say that I work in healthcare and I do wear a mask and find that when I wear this my make up lasts a lot longer at work. It is similar to the Iliah setting mist but you get almost twice the product for $3 more!! I know some people want make up to last a very long time and through sweat, working out, a long day at a hot beach, etc. and I don't know if this has the power and capacity to truly keep your makeup flawless for 20 hours like some other options. But for everyday use it is fabulous!

reviews.headline: Yes
reviews.comments: I have never used a setting mist.   This made my skin my skin so dewy and moisturized.   I now use this every day.

reviews.headline: It smells amazing
reviews.comments: First time using this and definitely will keep buying. It's so amazing like omg!

reviews.headline: Love it
reviews.comments: Love it and every other Estee Lauder product I've tried!

reviews.headline: Omg
reviews.comments: This sets my Double Wear Foundation to a satin semi dewy finish. Which is great because I wear the liquid Double Wear Foundation and set with the Double Wear powder foundation for a full coverage finish. I have dry skin so I need a good setting powder so I don't end up looking 80 years old and this one works better than quite a few other brands I've tried.

reviews.headline: Best setting spray
reviews.comments: I MUST use this for setting my undereye. I do NOT use powder, I use this with Estees radiant concealer and it is PERFECT. I look smooth and hydrated all day!

reviews.headline: Sets and stays all day !
reviews.comments: I spray this before skincare and after my makeup application. I love how it makes my setting powder look softer and helps hide my lines. It's a Necessity for any makeup lover !

reviews.headline: FAVE setting spray!
reviews.comments: Great for large pores and dehydrated skin. Makes your makeup look WAY less cakey. It smells amazing unlike urban decays that make me want to gag! I use it with beauty blender to set under eyes

reviews.headline: Absolutely LOVE the Product and the Mist
reviews.comments:
My skin oily, acne prone, sensitive .
I love this finishing Mist .  Keeps my make up set all day, does not make me oily, makes the skin Glow, awake looking, bright, smooth, never makes me break out, keeps makeup in place all day, Love the mist it is so fine and gets just the right amount on the face. Overall the skin just looks so nice when I use this. It is a little expensive but worth it and the bottle lasts a long time.

faceoff_positive.comments:
In the past I have used urban decay, benefit, and Milani setting sprays, but they would leave my face feeling tight and dry and I felt at the end of the day it took so much more soap and scrubbing to get off my make up off. I also tried supergoop and Milk, but those left me feeling oily and slick. This is a happy medium that provides make up with a boost to keep it looking fresh throughout the day but doesn't give a dry/tight/cakey feeling or appearance. 
I will say that I work in healthcare and I do wear a mask and find that when I wear this my make up lasts a lot longer at work. It is similar to the Iliah setting mist but you get almost twice the product for $3 more!! I know some people want make up to last a very long time and through sweat, working out, a long day at a hot beach, etc. and I don't know if this has the power and capacity to truly keep your makeup flawless for 20 hours like some other options. But for everyday use it is fabulous!
faceoff_positive.headline: Excellent setting spray

faceoff_negative.comments: I was excited to try this and it let me down compeltely. My skin didnt look better, feel better, and my make up definately didnt last. Returned.
faceoff_negative.headline: Not worth it
